name: Eye Know: Animals
description:
Eye Know: Animals is an expansion to the popular Eye Know: Image FX Word Quiz. Now you can play the same great animated effects with our huge collection of high quality animal photos.

Guess which bird is getting sucked into a vortex!
Can you spot an elephant out of a hundred puzzle pieces?
Is that a close-up of a hyena laughing?

Identify the image and spell the word from the available letter bank to win. We show you an animated and distorted picture and all you have to do is name the image! You show us how much you know! If you get stuck, there are bombs and hints to help you out! If you are really stumped, then you can skip a level.

Download Eye Know today and play through over 300 animated images of animals of every type, including mammals, birds, fish, insects, bugs, crustaceans, amphibians, molluscs and everything else! Can you guess them all?

While Eye Know is appropriate for all ages, some of the content may only be recognized by an older audience and the spelling of certain words may prove difficult.

Playing Eye Know is quick, easy and fun! Play it alone or have a group help you out! No registration required.

If you are looking for the original Eye Know: Image FX Word Quiz game you can find it at https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/eye-know-image-fx-word-quiz/id704538413

Brought to by Wiggles 3D, the creators of the Eye Know – Trivia for your Eyes board game, the challenging word spelling game app Lexigo Rush and the addictive Quote Slide daily word puzzle game.
